problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,已知∠ABC=35°,则∠AOC的大小是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O, and it is known that ∠ABC = N_0, then the size of ∠AOC is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,∠ABC=35°,∴∠AOC=35°×2=70°．
故选:B．
raw_comment: 考查了圆内接四边形的性质,圆周角定理,关键是熟练掌握圆周角定理．
